about_the_game:
Pump it up with these meowtastic songs specially for Spacecats with Lasers, the perfect soundtrack to shoot space rats and party with Spacecats!

Composed by: Thiago Adamo AKA PXLDJ

  • 01 SPACE CATS ARRIVING – 01:03
  • 02 - FUTURECATBASS – 02:55
  • 03 - HIGHSPEED CAT – 02:21
  • 04 - CATHUNTERZ – 02:34
  • 05 - ATMOSPHERE – 02:48
  • 06 - PUG APOCALIPSE NOW – 02:05
  • 07 - DACATZ GROOVE – 01:37
  • 08 - MEET THE SPACECATS – 00:56

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10 or later
  • Processor: 2000 Mhz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10 or later
  • Processor: 2000 Mhz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 2000 Mhz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 640x480 minimum resolution (Direct3D/OpenGL compatible card with at least 128MB)
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 2D sound compatible card
